page.title: Request a Proposal | Marquel Yvette Photography
page.description: Request a custom photography proposal. Professional headshots in Loudoun County, VA serving the DC Metro area. Get a personalized quote today.

hero.title: Let's Create Something Amazing Together
hero.description: Request a custom proposal tailored to your needs. Whether you need headshots for your exective team or a full team of employees, I'm here to help you make a lasting impression.

items.title: 24-Hour Response
items.description: I'll review your request and get back to you within one business day with a personalized proposal.

items.title: Custom Pricing
items.description: Your proposal will include package options tailored to your specific needs and budget.

items.title: Flexible Scheduling
items.description: Choose session times that work for your team's schedule, including weekends.

items.title: Professional Results
items.description: High-quality headshots that elevate your brand and make you stand out.

form.title: Request Your Proposal
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and I'll send you a detailed proposal within 24 hours.

steps.title: Submit Request
steps.description: Fill out the form with your project details and requirements.

steps.title: Receive Proposal
steps.description: Get a custom proposal with pricing and package options within 24 hours.

steps.title: Book Session
steps.description: Approve the proposal and schedule your session date.

steps.title: Get Results
steps.description: Enjoy your professional headshots delivered within 7 business days.
